model

Interface RestaurantDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OfflineDatabase, OnlineDatabase, RestaurantDAO, RestaurantMongoDB

    public interface RestaurantDatabase
    Takes care of Database connection - application needs ability download and upload List data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Restaurant> loadRestaurants()
      Load all Restaurants from database throws exception when no data available or when data is in invalid format
      boolean storeRestaurants(java.util.List<Restaurant> restaurantsFromDb)
      Used to upload restaurant array to database

    • Method Detail

      • storeRestaurants

                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Used to upload restaurant array to database
        Parameters:
        restaurantsFromDb -
        Returns:
        boolean - true if successful upload, false if partial or complete failure
